TheWitcherMod:Roach.NAME: Roach
TheWitcherMod:Roach.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you draw NL this card, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Draw !TheWitcherMod:SM! card{!TheWitcherMod:SM!|>1=s}.

TheWitcherMod:FightingStyleFast.NAME: Fighting Style: Fast
TheWitcherMod:FightingStyleFast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase damage by !M! for this action. NL Repeat X times.

TheWitcherMod:CollectionOfTrophies.NAME: Collection of Trophies
TheWitcherMod:CollectionOfTrophies.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is [thewitchermod:TargetOfTheContractIcon] , NL deal double damage. NL If Fatal, gain 1 Reputation.

TheWitcherMod:DevilsPuffball.NAME: Devil's Puffball
TheWitcherMod:DevilsPuffball.DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Bomb. NL Apply !M! Poison NL to ALL enemies.

TheWitcherMod:DancingStar.NAME: Dancing Star
TheWitcherMod:DancingStar.DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Bomb. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Then deal !TheWitcherMod:MD! damage NL to ALL enemies.

TheWitcherMod:Samum.NAME: Samum
TheWitcherMod:Samum.DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Bomb. NL Remove all Block NL from a enemy. NL Apply 2 Weak.
TheWitcherMod:Samum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Bomb. NL Remove all Block NL from a enemy. NL Apply 2 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable.

TheWitcherMod:MakingABomb.NAME: Making a Bomb
TheWitcherMod:MakingABomb.DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Preparation. NL Add 1 random common NL a thewitchermod:Bomb card NL to your deck, then shuffle it into your draw pile.
TheWitcherMod:MakingABomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Preparation. NL Add 1 random common NL upgraded a thewitchermod:Bomb card NL to your deck, then shuffle it into your draw pile.

TheWitcherMod:ArmorUp.NAME: Armor Up
TheWitcherMod:ArmorUp.DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Preparation. NL Gain 1 Dexterity NL for !M! turns.

TheWitcherMod:Vigilance.NAME: Vigilance
TheWitcherMod:Vigilance.DESCRIPTION: thewitchermod:Preparation. NL Gain 1 Strength NL for !M! turns.

TheWitcherMod:SweepingStrike.NAME: Sweeping Strike
TheWitcherMod:SweepingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy NL doesn't have a Block, NL deal !M! more damage.

TheWitcherMod:PrecisionStrike.NAME: Precision Strike
TheWitcherMod:PrecisionStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy NL has a Block, NL deal !M! more damage.
